statements: SELECT * FROM personalized_email_content;
SELECT customer_name, past_purchases FROM personalized_email_content WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name FROM personalized_email_content WHERE past_purchases ->> 'category' = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM personalized_email_content ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM personalized_email_content;
SELECT * FROM personalized_email_content WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, JSON_VALUE(past_purchases, '$.item[0].name') AS first_purchase FROM personalized_email_content WHERE JSON_VALUE(past_purchases, '$.item[0].price') > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, JSON_QUERY(past_purchases, '$.item[0]') AS first_purchase_details FROM personalized_email_content WHERE JSON_VALUE(past_purchases, '$.item[0].price') < 50;
SELECT customer_name, JSON_QUERY(past_purchases, '$.item[1]') AS second_purchase_details FROM personalized_email_content WHERE JSON_VALUE(past_purchases, '$.item[1].price') > 200;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, JSON_VALUE(past_purchases, '$.item[-1].name') AS last_purchase FROM personalized_email_content WHERE JSON_VALUE(past_purchases, '$.item[-1].price') BETWEEN 50 AND 150;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases WHERE product_name LIKE '%iPhone%';
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT email_id, customer_id, email_subject FROM email_content ORDER BY email_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT pc.customer_name, pu.purchase_date, pu.purchase_amount FROM customers pc INNER JOIN purchases pu ON pc.customer_id = pu.customer_id;
SELECT ec.email_subject, ec.email_body FROM email_content ec WHERE ec.customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers JOIN personalized_emails ON customers.customer_id = personalized_emails.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, email_content FROM personalized_emails;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT template_name, subject FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT email_content, sent_date FROM personalized_emails ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' OR last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT template_name, subject FROM email_templates WHERE LENGTH(body) > 500 ORDER BY template_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, price ASC;
